title.rendered: Macallan 78 Year Old The Red Collection

excerpt.rendered:
The Macallan Red Collection 78 year old – The oldest release from Macallan to date!

The Red Collection reflects Macallan’s deep respect for time, tradition and craftsmanship. It is a celebration of the rich range of reds present in The Macallan in every step of the process.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 78
Vintage : 
ABV : 42.2%
